snippet: The Giants' system of leadership, which includes team captains, held together during adversity this season. The Jets fell apart.
abstract: The Giants' system of leadership, which includes team captains, held together during adversity this season. The Jets fell apart.
lead_paragraph: For those who missed Bill Pennington's article on the Giants' captains on Saturday, it gave excellent insight into the team's leadership structure. A few quotations:

headline.main: Giants, Jets and the Value of Captains
